description:
Artist: Sutu | Medium: Animation, GIF: 1000x1000 pixels | Original Creation Date: September, 2021 

This is a special commemorative coin gifted to hodlers of Here and Now as a token of appreciation for their support. 

To receive this Sutu render of the original Edition 3 coin, hodlers must have the following in their wallets:

1x Edition One Ticket (Beets) OR 1x Edition Two Ticket (Shvembdlr)
AND
1x Edition Three Ticket (liasomething) 

If a ticket-holder meets these requirements more recently, then they will be required to hold the above tickets till at least the next edition. 

Here and Now ticket-holders will always be rewarded of their support, it's a two way street, and the more you hold, the more you benefit. 

Contact @wideawakebeets for more info.  

https://wideawakeprojects.com/roadmap
